setimageCarousel.fieldDescription: Click 'Add' to add a new item

image-preset.fieldDescription: Image Preset to use when rendering image. It cannot be set when viewer preset is set.
image-preset.name: ./s7ImagePreset

image-modifiers.fieldDescription: Additional S7 image commands separated by '&'.Field gives complete flexibility to change image effects.
image-modifiers.name: ./imageModifiers
